title: Increase in reserves - increase in money supply

content.prompt: Assume that the reserve requirement is 20 percent, but banks voluntarily keep some excess reserves. A $1 million increase in new reserves will result in

choices.label: an increase in the money supply of $5 million
an increase in the money supply of less than $5 million
a decrease in the money supply of $1 million
a decrease in the money supply of $5 million
a decrease in the money supply of more than $5 million

topic.text: 4.4: Banking and the Expansion of the Money Supply

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
